meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the February 12, 2024 Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Public Safety Recruiting and Retention Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the recruiting and retention efforts for public safety personnel.

agenda_items.title: Violent Crime Reduction Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the strategies and progress of the violent crime reduction plan.

agenda_items.title: Overview of the Public Safety Technology Projects
agenda_items.description: Presentation on current and upcoming technology projects in public safety.

agenda_items.title: Overview of the Dallas Online Reporting System (DORS) Expansion
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the expansion of the online reporting system to address minor hit-and-run collisions.

agenda_items.title: Sobering Center Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the operations and status of the Sobering Center.
agenda_items.presenter: David Pughes, Scott Whitworth, Kristen Kubat

financial_items.description: Authorize a five-year agreement for emergency medical technician basic training, paramedic training, and continuing education services for Dallas Fire-Rescue.
Authorize an agreement with the Safe City Commission for the receipt of funds for equipping vehicles used by officers.
Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement for THC Quantification and controlled substance quantitation analysis.
Authorize a one-year Interlocal Agreement with the University of Texas at San Antonio for consulting services.
Authorize acceptance of a grant for the design and construction of a regional law enforcement training facility.
